title: Review & optimize: Thalassian Highlands (1-10) guide
description:
Review and optimize the existing Thalassian Highlands guide based on three core principles.

## Review Checklist

### 1. Verify Prerequisites (MUST be correct)
- Check pfQuest ["pre"] field for each QID
- Ensure TURNIN comes before dependent quest ACCEPT
- Quest IDs: 41187-41231 range

### 2. Verify Level Requirements (SHOULD respect)
- Check pfQuest ["min"] field
- Lower level quests before higher level quests

### 3. Optimize Geographic Proximity
- All hub quests picked up before leaving
- Objectives in same area completed together
- Minimize backtracking

## Hub Locations
- Brinthilien (~48, 84) - starting
- Thaumarium (~52, 64) - winery
- Silver Covenant Camp (~44, 57)
- Anasterian Park (~55, 46)
- Ballador's Chapel (~44, 50)
- Alah'Thalas (~55, 38) - city

## Files
- Guide: Guides/Alliance/01_10_Thalassian_Highlands.lua
- pfQuest: pfQuest-turtle/db/quests-turtle.lua
- Docs: docs/GUIDE_AUTHORING.md

## Output
- Report any issues found
- Update guide with optimizations

title: Create guide: Blackstone Island (1-10) Goblin starting zone
description:
Create a leveling guide for Blackstone Island, the Goblin starting zone (levels 1-10, Horde).

## Core Principles
Order quests using THREE factors:
1. Prerequisites - Check pfQuest ["pre"] field (MUST respect)
2. Level Requirements - Check pfQuest ["min"] field (SHOULD respect)
3. Geographic Proximity - Group nearby quests (OPTIMIZE)

## Research Steps
1. Search online: "Turtle WoW Blackstone Island quests"
2. Use https://database.turtle-wow.org/ for quest data
3. Check pfQuest-turtle/db/quests-turtle.lua for prerequisites
4. Check pfQuest-turtle/db/units-turtle.lua for NPC coordinates

## Output
- Create: Guides/Horde/01_10_Blackstone_Island.lua
- Register in: Guides/Horde/Guides.xml
- Reference: Guides/Alliance/01_10_Thalassian_Highlands.lua
- Docs: docs/GUIDE_AUTHORING.md
